Class RuleNameController

java.lang.Object
com.nnk.springboot.controllers.RuleNameController
@Controller public class RuleNameController extends Object
this class is the controller for the entity RuleName.

  • Method Details

    • home

      @GetMapping("/ruleName/list") public String home(org.springframework.ui.Model model, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest)
      this endpoint is to display the list of the ruleName.
      Parameters:
      model - contains all ruleName.
      httpServletRequest - contains the userRemote.
      Returns:
      return the url with the list of the ruleName.

    • addRuleNameForm

      @GetMapping("/ruleName/add") public String addRuleNameForm(RuleName ruleName)
      this endpoint is to create a new RuleName.
      Parameters:
      ruleName - contains the information for the new RuleName.
      Returns:
      return the url to create a new RuleName with the new RuleName.

    • validate

      @PostMapping("/ruleName/validate") public String validate(@Valid @Valid RuleName ruleName, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      this endpoint is to retrieve the information of the new RuleName.
      Parameters:
      ruleName - contains the information for the new RuleName.
      result - contains the information to check the data.
      model - contains all ruleName.
      Returns:
      return the url with the list of the ruleName if the datas are OK or the url to create a new RuleName if the data is not OK.

    • showUpdateForm

      @GetMapping("/ruleName/update/{id}") public String showUpdateForm(@PathVariable Integer id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      this endpoint is to update a RuleName with this id.
      Parameters:
      id - contains the id of the RuleName.
      model - contain the RuleName.
      Returns:
      return the url to update a RuleName if the id is OK or the url with the list of the ruleName if the id is not OK.

    • updateRuleName

      @PostMapping("/ruleName/update/{id}") public String updateRuleName(@PathVariable Integer id, @Valid @Valid RuleName ruleName, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      this endpoint is to retrieve the information of the updated RuleName.
      Parameters:
      id - contains the id of the RuleName.
      ruleName - contains the information for the updated RuleName.
      result - contains the information to check the data.
      model - contains all ruleName.
      Returns:
      return the url with the list of the ruleName if the datas are OK or the url to update a RuleName if the data is not OK.

    • deleteRuleName

      @GetMapping("/ruleName/delete/{id}") public String deleteRuleName(@PathVariable Integer id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      this endpoint is to delete a RuleName with this id.
      Parameters:
      id - contains the id of the RuleName
      model - contains all ruleName.
      Returns:
      return the url with the list of the ruleName
